Whopper.name: Whopper
Whopper.desc: Look who's here - THE burger to rule them all. A real meaty flame-grilled Whopper® beef patty, topped with tangy pickles, ketchup, fresh tomatoes, crisp lettuce and fresh onions, finished with creamy mayo , and served on a toasted 5" sesame seed bun. Feeling hungry for a real meaty burger yet?

Whopper.name: Whopper® with Cheese
Whopper.desc: What else can we say, all the great taste of the WHOPPER® with cheese. A truly cheesillicious WHOPPIN' Time.

Whopper.name: Whopper® Jr
Whopper.desc: The same big WHOPPER® taste, but in a regular size. A mouth-watering, flame-grilled beef patty topped with fresh tomatoes, crisp lettuce, tangy pickles and crunchy onions, served on a toasted sesame seed bun and flavored with creamy mayo and ketchup. Ummm...yummy.

Beef.name: Single BBQ Beefacon®
Beef.desc: Always the right choice with our Single BBQ Beefacon®. Our signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with Beefacon® , cheese and our special smokey BBQ sauce all in a toasted sesame seed bun. One of life’s simple pleasures.

Beef.name: Double BBQ Beefacon®
Beef.desc:
Double it up...Double the taste!!
        Grab hold of our Double BBQ Beefacon® with cheese slices, Beefacon® and delicious smokey BBQ sauce to complete the sensational taste.

Beef.name: Single Mushroom Swiss
Beef.desc: A creation like no other! Creamy subtle taste of mushroom and melted swiss cheese with perfectly grilled beef patties served with soft sesame buns. Mush-room for your tummy to be filled!

Beef.name: Double Mushroom Swiss
Beef.desc: Can't get enough of that heavenly creamy taste? Go for double the goodness! Melted Swiss cheese on two flame-grilled beef patties, topped with BK's special mushroom sauce, served on a sesame seed bun. Twice the velvety goodness in every bite

Beef.name: Cheeseburger
Beef.desc: You can’t go wrong with our cheeseburger, a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with a simple layer of melted American cheese, crinkle cut pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.

Beef.name: Double Cheeseburger
Beef.desc: Make room for our Double Cheeseburger, two signature flame-grilled beef patties topped with a simple layer of melted American cheese, crinkle cut pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.

Beef.name: Long Cheesy Onion Beef
Beef.desc: Meet the Long Cheesy Onion Beef burger! Featuring 2 pieces of our signature flame-grilled beef patties topped with Nachos Cheese sauce, mayonnaise, mustard, pickles and fresh onions served between two long sesame seed buns - this tender and juicy burger is what you’re looking for!

Chicken.name: BK Chick'N Crisp
Chicken.desc: Some call it “Chicken Crisp”. Others call it “Chick and Crisp”. Whatever you call it, you’ll get a yummyliciously crispy chicken fillet topped with garden-fresh lettuce and creamy mayo, served on a sesame seed bun. The fusion of textures, tastes and aromas is a winner — ‘N there’s no doubt about that.

Chicken.name: Spicy Tendercrisp
Chicken.desc: Like your chicken crispy, or tender? Why not both? The Tendercrisp™ patty - made from chicken thigh to be crispy outside and tender inside - is topped with a tomato slice, freshly shredded lettuce and creamy mayo, then served on a fragrant sesame seed bun. Perfect for those who want the best of both worlds.

Chicken.name: Tendergrill
Chicken.desc: Wonder why it's called Tendergrill™? That's 'cos we made sure to flame-grill the chicken thighs to soft, juicy perfection. Best enjoyed with fries and soft drink.

Chicken.name: French Chicken
Chicken.desc: Bonjour! The beauty that was created for an everlasting love. Crispy long chicken patty with a combination of chicken strips, melted Swiss cheese and creamy mayo sandwiched between two long sesame seed buns. A definite top favourite!

Chicken.name: Long Chicken
Chicken.desc: Delightfully tasty crispy chicken fillet topped with shredded lettuce and creamy mayo, and served on a 7” sesame seed bun-made extra long because we know you don't want the delicious bites to end so quickly.

Chicken.name: Crispy Fried Chicken
Chicken.desc: Crunchy on the outside. Juicy on the inside. Be warned, our fried chicken can be pretty addictive. Comes with Coke and salad or fries

Veggies.name: Mushroom Veggie Burger
Veggies.desc: Here's an option for our Veggie-loving friends! Our Mushroom Veggie Burger features our famous chunky mushroom in special sauce combination that compliments the burger so well, it's like a party in your mouth.

Veggies.name: Salad
Veggies.desc: Something light on the tummy but super packed with great nutrients. Come enjoy our salad bowl with special sauce on its own or swap it with fries when you order your next BK meal!

Dessert.name: Apple Pie
Dessert.desc: Sweet Apple chunks in a crispy pie crust. It'll win you over in a bite! Perfect after meals

Dessert.name: HERSHEY’S Sundae Pie
Dessert.desc: Say hello to our HERSHEY’S® Sundae Pie. One part crunchy chocolate crust and one part chocolate crème filling, garnished with a delicious topping of fudge drizzle and real HERSHEY’S® Chocolate Chips.

Dessert.name: Banana Pie
Dessert.desc: Sweet banana chuncks in crispy pie crust. It'll win you over in a bite! Perfect after meals.

Beverage.name: Mineral Water
Beverage.desc: Cool down with our Mineral water, it sure does quench your thirst!

Beverage.name: Americano
Beverage.desc: Espresso combined with water. Same strength as drip coffee, but a different flavor. Try it!. Hot & Iced Americano are available.

Beverage.name: Latte
Beverage.desc: Makes mornings worth waking up for. Espresso and milk. Hot & Iced Latte are available.

Beverage.name: Hot Tea
Beverage.desc: A tea lover will always find a way to enjoy it. You can now enjoy at BK. Perfect for relaxation.

Beverage.name: Ice Sjora
Beverage.desc: You wanna be refreshed? Here’s what you should have
